MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 area of Hamilton, affecting properties in Brackenhill Drive and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm due to repairs required to our underground electricity network outside 87 Brackenhill Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:56pm on Saturday, 06 February 2021
